verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines:
Cling to the Bible,
Cling to the Bible!
Cling to the Bible,
Our Lamp and our Guide!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cling to the Bible! This jewel and treasure
Brings life eternal, and saves fallen man;
Surely its value no mortal can measure:
Seek for its blessing, O soul, while you can!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
